pages.text: $(li)The Stone Shores is a simple small biome with often appears when a Mountainous biome is generated near of an Ocean.$(br)$(li)They are composed of mostly Stone, Limestone, Scoria, Marble, Diorite and Andesite.$(br)$(li)This biome can be found in the Overworld.
$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Stone Shores$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
